net.sf.gilead.comet
Class CometRemoteService

java.lang.Object
  RemoteServiceServlet
      net.sf.gilead.comet.CometRemoteService
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersistentCometService
public abstract class CometRemoteService
extends RemoteServiceServlet

Abstract class for GWT remote service using tomcat CometProcessor. Note that, as I use Session to identify pending request, all clients have to enable cookies.

Author:
vincent legendre

haveData

protected boolean haveData(RPCRequest p_request)
Returns:
true if answer associated to this request have data to be send. if false is returned, the request will be queued for a later call.

onCurrentRequestAbort

protected void onCurrentRequestAbort(PendingRequest p_abortedRequest)
This method is called when a request is aborted by client. ie when client leave current page. You can't write into response, but you can broadcast event on all pending request as p_abortedRequest is already closed note that p_abortedRequest.event == null
